title: Node or validator is not properly cleaned up in test
body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**
<!--A clear and concise description of what the bug is and steps to reproduce it.-->
When running the tests in https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/compare/dapplion/e2e+?expand=1 and successfully complete them, some component is not properly cleaned up and spam the terminal with this repeating error that never stops.

```
(node:3148) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: TypeError: Cannot destructure property `state` of 'undefined' or 'null'.
    at Timeout._onTimeout (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/test/e2e/noEth1Sim.test.ts:55:19)
(node:3148) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). (rejection id: 4)
(node:3148) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: TypeError: Cannot destructure property `state` of 'undefined' or 'null'.
    at Timeout._onTimeout (/home/lion/Code/eth2.0/lodestar/packages/lodestar/test/e2e/noEth1Sim.test.ts:55:19)
(node:3148) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). (rejection id: 5)
``` 

**Expected behavior**
<!--A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.-->
`stop` methods should clean and stop all components
```js
  after("Stop nodes and validators", async () => {
    for (const node of nodes) {
      await node.stop();
    }
    for (const validator of validators) {
      await validator.stop();
    }
  });
```

**Steps to Reproduce**
<!--Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error
-->

Checkout branch https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/compare/dapplion/e2e+?expand=1 and
```
cd packages/lodestar
yarn test:e2e
```
Wait for the test to complete
